title: Introducing: Mt. Si.
content:
Well this is a little bit special.

I’m not entirely sure who Mt. Si. are, listing their names on Bandcamp as Sarah, Jesse (presumably from Kisses) and Mike, the trio hail from LA, and already appear to be grabbing the attention of other musicians (followers on Soundcloud include, RAC and Kisses). Their two debut tracks, True and Oh are two of the finest slices of ethereal pop I’ve heard in recent times, lead by a stunning vocal line, underpinned by a sea of gorgeous textures. Trust me on this, Mt. Si. are going far. Check out both tracks below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
